channel.title: mtgiko on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in mtgiko on Roy Tang

item.title: New photos
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Third #mtgiko quick draft went 6-3. Last couple of losses were close, almost got the 7. Are games just easier to win in quick draft? My win rate is at like 72% currently for QD vs < 60 for premiere. Or maybe I just got lucky and I’m gonna eat these words later? #mtg

item.title: New photos
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
#mtgiko quick draft: while this Extinction Event was on the stack, I can see my opponent’s cursor mouse over each of his creatures in turn, realizing 2 out of 3 were even, then over mine one at a time, realizing they were all odd. Lol. #mtg

That was my 2nd quick draft. I haven’t been streaming them because I don’t plan to do a lot, but this one went surprisingly well, so documentation:

And yes, that was a P1P1 rare-drafted Eerie Ultimatum lol. I think it won me like 6/7 games

item.description:
Ikoria draft no. 14 https://www.twitch.tv/twitchyroy #mtg #magicarena #mtgiko #twitch
